name: xbackbone
tagline: A self-hosted file hosting and sharing platform
description: XBackBone is a self-hosted file hosting and sharing platform with short links, drag-and-drop uploads, multi-user support, and integrations with share clients and screenshot tools.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files directly from your browser with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for quick sharing

features.title: Short Link Generation
features.description: Automatically create shortened URLs for uploaded files to simplify sharing and tracking

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Manage multiple user accounts with individual storage quotas and permission controls

features.title: Screenshot Tool Integration
features.description: Connect with ShareX, Flameshot, and other screenshot utilities for instant uploads

features.title: REST API
features.description: Use built-in API support to integrate with third-party upload clients and automation tools

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor disk usage, set file retention policies, and manage uploaded content through an admin dashboard

features.title: Public And Private Sharing
features.description: Control file visibility with public links or password-protected private shares

features.title: Media Library
features.description: View images, videos, and documents directly in the browser without downloading
